page.title: 11PARKS
page.content: The park is a place where people play. But,somewhere in Bramley,there is a park where some builders are going to build some houses.We think it is because Bramley has a lot of grassed open spaces and not many houses. Usually {PARKS}have got things like a climbing frame,3 big swings and 3 little swings,a slide and some grass to play on.In Bramley there is a stream flowing through.There is a trunk of a tree across the stream ,which people use to cross over it. At the side of our park are some fields and up abit more on the other side you can see the youth club. On our survey we saw {4 PARKS} ,which,if you think about it,is a lot for one village. By {Alison Pennicott and Michelle {Wallace. }
